title: 5.0.0 files removed after upgrading
body:
after upgrading today from 4.5.8 to 5.0.0 i lost almost all of my files (about 4 gb of documents).
i updated via apt-get using the deb source. after opening the login page in firefox the update process started. after a while (30 mins?!) i refreshed and the page told me something about "oc in maintenance mode". after this didn't change during the next hour i set the value for maintenance in config.php to "false". thereafter the update process seemed to be successful within seconds.
later i realized that almost all of my files in the subfolders of my synced folder where missing on my local (!) machine and after checking also in the webinterface. after searching i found out, that all files are intact in the owncloud/data/user/files directory and all files are also available to open via the oc search in the webinterface.
addressbooks and calendars are not affected. picture app correctly shows the content of the pics stored in my files.

the log says thousand times "adding user backend instance of oc_user_database."
in the admin panel is a red warning message: "webserver isn't ready for filesync, beacuse webdav could be broken.

thx for your suggests!

server: ubuntu 12.04 x64, apache 2.2.22, php 5.3.10, sqlite
client: ubuntu 12.10 x64, oc sync client 1.2.1, firefox 19.0.2
